title: IBA expects to attract Rs 1,600 cr investment for biogas sector at REI 2024
description: The Indian Biogas Association anticipates Rs 1,600 crore investment in the biogas sector during the Renewable Energy India Expo 2024. The event, starting Thursday, is expected to see a 20% increase in participation and will highlight biogas's potential in India's energy future. Government ministries and prominent organizations are supporting the expo, which aims to boost renewable energy innovations.
